column2: For thousands of years the Blackwater was divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the Blackwater and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years Dorne was divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim Dorne and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the Iron Islands were divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the Iron Islands and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the North was divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the North and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the Reach was divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the North and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the Riverlands were divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the Riverlands and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the Stormlands were divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the Stormlands and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the Vale was divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the Vale and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years the Westerlands were divided and lacked a strong ruler willing to unite it under one banner but those times have come to an end. You claim the Westerlands and demand that all remaining kings within that kingdom swear fealty to you.

For thousands of years [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] were ruled by petty kings. But now all of them are united in one realm, under the banner of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]. Still, some of them call themselves kings, even though they swore fealty to me and are my legal subjects.
King-tier rulers continue calling themselves King or Queen.
Let them keep their rank but I am the king.
All king-tier rulers are named Lord and Lady Marshal.
There is only one king in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
[From.GetTitledName] has decided that you may continue to name yourself [Root.GetKingQueen] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
At least I keep my vassals...
I will not forget my claim!

[From.GetDynName] has named [From.GetHerselfHimself] High [From.GetKingQueen] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and now demands the remaining lands within this kingdom. If you do not accept [From.GetDynName]'s demand and accept [From.GetHerHim] as your rightful liege he might take your lands by war or you join him...
This is none of my concern.
You accept [From.GetDynName] as your righful liege.
If another ruler decides to claim the Kingdom himself you will automatically join him.
Other Kings might join you and support your claim. After the war they will swear fealty and accept you as their liege. You make ready for war.
The riders have returned bringing word from the Petty Kings...

To the [Root.GetRootFromCompliment] [Root.GetTitledName], I hereby swear allegiance to House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] and accept you as my righful liege and [Root.GetKingQueen] of [high_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName] when the war is won.

[From.GetTitledName] has announced in a royal decree that from now on there shall be only one [high_king.GetKingQueen] in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. However, you may keep your rank and call yourself the Marshal of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

[FromFrom.GetBestName] has named [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] [FromFrom.GetKingQueen] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitleGetBaseName] and has declared that shall be only one [FromFrom.GetKingQueen]. The realm's administration is from now on located at your lieges capital rather than splitted up to several Marshals.

The war is over and [From.GetBestName] has been defeated. The allies of [Root.GetBestName] accept [Root.GetHerHis] claim on the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] which are now united under the banner of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]. No one dares to question [Root.GetHerHis] claim. However, some lords still favor [From.GetTitledFirstName] and might rebell against you when the time has come.

[From.GetTitledName] has claimed the [high_king.PrimaryTitle.GetFullBaseName]. When the war against [high_king.GetDynName] is won you might join him and name him [From.GetKingQueen] instead of [high_king.GetDynName].

The war is over and [Root.GetBestName] has been defeated and is now imprisoned by the coalition. The forces of [From.GetBestName] proved themselves superior. [old_title.GetFullBaseName] is forfeit and is once again divided into Petty Kingdoms.

The coalition has been defeated. [Root.GetBestName] shown that [Root.GetSheHe] is truly superior to the other Petty Kings of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName] and now they kneel before [Root.GetHerHim] and swear eternal fealty to their new [Root.GetKingQueen].
All Kings and Queens in your realm shall from now on call themselves Lord and Lady Marshal.
There is only one [This.GetKingQueen] in [This.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. None of my vassals shall ever name himself king or queen nor shall he have a king's position in my realm.
